experiences: Part of the Google Developer Group Mentorship Program
Working as a Front-End Developer, using React & Typescript
Competing in the Annual Formula Student Competition
Researching path planning and optimization, using computer vision and machine learning
Using cameras to allow the race car to create and follow racing lines based on real-time input
Working as part of the logistics team for GreatUniHack 2024, a 24-hour hackathon with 250 participants
Handling Logistical Planning, Prize Sourcing, Catering and Budget Management.
